title: Creating Clash Team (Silver/Gold)
body:
Making a new clash team and hoping to find some cool people to play clash with! Be chill and don't flame! But definitely try your best!

Add my IGN to join the team: Ðean

Copy & paste my IGN to add me.

replies.body:
I'll add tmrw morning if you're still looking, supp/mid/ad, in that order.
Ign Tepee
I've added you. Silver 3 adc or support.
